"It's really special to me because it was a present. Zeno gave it to me when I first joined ARKS. "
"I've been using it ever since, so it's kind of like an old friend. What a relief to get it back!"
"I can't thank you enough! Please accept this reward, though. After all, this was a client order."

"You can now invite Echo to join you as a partner."
